sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import './App.css'; import { Route, Routes} from 'react-router-dom' import Main from './pages/Main'; import AboutUs from './pages/AboutUs'; import logo from './images/logo.png'; import title from './images/title.png'; import logoWhite from './images/logoWhite.png'; import panner1 from './images/panner1.PNG' import panner2 from './images/panner2.PNG' import Texts from './Texts'; import {Context} from './Context'; function App() { const {lang, setLang} = useContext(Context); const texts = Texts[lang]; const container = useRef(); function changeLang(){ if (lang == 'ar'){ setLang('en') container.current.style.direction = 'ltr'; } else{ setLang('ar') container.current.style.direction = 'rtl'; } } useEffect(() => { const script = document.createElement('script'); script.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); }, []); return (
